room_title: Escape room "Purple Rain" by Escape Waukesha in Milwaukee
room_description:
Prince University professor and world-renowned scientist is using the school’s lab to create a chemical weapon of mass destruction code-named “Purple Rain.” When inhaled, it’s toxic fumes slowly begin to breakdown the nervous system. After 60 minutes, the damage is irreversible. Five countries have lined up and are prepared to pay top dollar for the secret formula. Unbeknownst to Dr. Karloff, the University suspects something sinister is taking place. University Chancellor Morris Day says it’s “time” for Karloff to take early retirement and dismisses him from the school.

Dr. Karloff is furious. He is so close to finishing his work and all he needs are some test subjects. He devises a plan to play along with the University and accept retirement. You have been asked by him to help remove some of his personal items in his lab. After waiting for Dr. Karloff to arrive, you suddenly realized that you’re locked in his lab and have become one of his guinea pigs. A strange purple gas is seeping into the room from the wall. Can you escape before the poison takes it’s full effect, or will he “Gett Off” scot-free?
